titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on chloro amino toluene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/11/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend the suspension of duty from December 31, 2003 to December 31, 2006, on chloro amino toluene.
